The Linux docker image changed and some tools were removed. Can you add `git` to the build requirements? Or better yet. Change,

``` yaml
source:
    git_url: https://github.com/Ohjeah/ffx
    git_tag: d1f027ed5f4a543c41af13f4b9a2be882ec4dd6a
```

to (the first line at the top right below the version)

``` yaml
{% set commit = "d1f027ed5f4a543c41af13f4b9a2be882ec4dd6a" %}

source:
    fn: {{ commit }}.tar.gz
    url: https://github.com/Ohjeah/ffx/archive/{{ commit }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 44977347d9c9a60838283e3a684efe10a7772129c7d604fdc6695e85b9d7fc1f

```
